name: Marcello v. Farrell, Appellant; Brown v. Farrell, Appellant

judges: Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Marcello v. Farrell, Appellant. Brown v. Farrell, Appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
Marcello v. Farrell, Appellant. Brown v. Farrell, Appellant.
Argued March 15, 1966.
Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
April 19, 1966:
William J. Joyce, with him Albert E. Acher, and Gusidk, Madden, Joyce, Acker and McKay, for appellant.
Bernard Goldstone, with him Routman, Moore & Goldstone, for appellee.
